h5701.definition: a primitive root; to be sad; grieve.

h5702.definition: a primitive root; to debar, i.e. from marriage; stay.

h5703.definition: from {{h5710}}; properly, a (peremptory) terminus, i.e. (by implication) duration, in the sense of advance or perpetuity (substantially as a noun, either with or without a preposition); eternity, ever(-lasting, -more), old, perpetually,   world without end.

h5704.definition: properly, the same as {{h5703}} (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition); as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with); against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to,   how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, (  as) yet.

h5705.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h5704}}; × and, at, for, (hither-) to, on till, (un-) to, until, within.

h5706.definition: the same as {{h5703}} in the sense of the aim of an attack; booty; prey.

h5707.definition: contracted from {{h5749}}; concretely, a witness; abstractly, testimony; specifically, a recorder, i.e. prince; witness.

h5708.definition: from an unused root meaning to set a period (compare {{h5710}}, {{h5749}}); the menstrual flux (as periodical); by implication (in plural) soiling; filthy.

h5709.definition: (Aramaic) or עֲדָה; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h5710}}; alter, depart, pass (away), remove, take (away).

h5710.definition: a primitive root; to advance, i.e. pass on or continue; causatively, to remove; specifically, to bedeck (i.e. bring an ornament upon); adorn, deck (self), pass by, take away.

h5711.definition: from {{h5710}}; ornament; Adah, the name of two women; Adah.

h5712.definition: feminine of {{h5707}} in the original sense of fixture; a stated assemblage (specifically, a concourse, or generally, a family or crowd); assembly, company, congregation, multitude, people, swarm. Compare {{h5713}}.

h5713.definition: feminine of {{h5707}} in its techn. sense; testimony; testimony, witness. Compare {{h5712}}.

h5714.definition: or עִדּוֹא; or עִדִּיא; from {{h5710}}; timely; Iddo (or Iddi), the name of five Israelites; Iddo. Compare {{h3035}}, {{h3260}}.

h5716.definition: from {{h5710}} in the sense of trappings; finery; generally an outfit; specifically, a headstall; × excellent, mouth, ornament.

h5717.definition: from {{h5716}} and {{h410}}; ornament of God; Adiel, the name of three Israelites; Adiel.

h5718.definition: or עֲדָיָהוּ; from {{h5710}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has adorned; Adajah, the name of eight Israelites; Adaiah.

h5720.definition: the same as {{h5719}}; Adin, the name of two Israelites; Adin.

h5721.definition: from {{h5719}}; effeminacy; Adina, an Israelite; Adina.

h5722.definition: probably from {{h5719}} in the original sense of slender (i.e. a spear); his spear; Adino.

h5723.definition: dual of a feminine of {{h5706}}; double prey; Adithajim, a place in Palestine; Adithaim.

h5724.definition: probably from an unused root of uncertain meaning; Adlai, an Israelite; Adlai.

h5725.definition: probably from the passive participle of the same as {{h5724}}; Adullam, a place in Palestine; Adullam.

h5726.definition: patrial from {{h5725}}; an Adullamite or native of Adullam; Adullamite.

h5727.definition: a primitive root; to be soft or pleasant; figuratively and reflexively, to live voluptuously; delight self.

h5728.definition: or עֲדֶנָּה; from {{h5704}} and {{h2004}}; till now; yet.

h5729.definition: from {{h5727}}; pleasure; Eden, a place in Mesopotamia; Eden.

h5730.definition: or (feminine) עֶדְנָה; from {{h5727}}; pleasure; delicate, delight, pleasure. See also {{h1040}}.

h5731.definition: the same as {{h5730}} (masculine); Eden, the region of Adam's home; Eden.

h5732.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to that of {{h5708}}; a set time; technically, a year; time.

h5733.definition: from {{h5727}}; pleasure; Adna, the name of two Israelites; Adna.

h5734.definition: from {{h5727}}; pleasure; Adnah, the name of two Israelites; Adnah.

h5735.definition: from {{h5712}}; festival; Adadah, a place in Palestine; Adadah.

h5736.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively have) redundant; be more, odd number, be (have) over (and above), overplus, remain.

h5737.definition: a primitive root; to arrange, as a battle, a vineyard (to hoe); hence, to muster and so to miss (or find wanting); dig, fail, keep (rank), lack.

h5738.definition: from {{h5737}}; an arrangement (i.e. drove); Eder, an Israelite; Ader.

h5739.definition: from {{h5737}}; an arrangement, i.e. muster (of animals); drove, flock, herd.

h5740.definition: the same as {{h5739}}; Eder, the name of an Israelite and of two places in Palestine; Edar, Eder.

h5741.definition: from {{h5739}} and {{h410}}; flock of God; Adriel, an Israelite; Adriel.

h5742.definition: from an unused root of uncertain meaning; a lentil; lentile.

h5743.definition: a primitive root; to be dense or dark, i.e. to becloud; cover with a cloud.

h5744.definition: active participle of {{h5647}}; serving; Obed, the name of five Israelites; Obed.

h5745.definition: of foreign derivation; Obal, a son of Joktan; Obal.

h5746.definition: a primitive root; properly, to gyrate; but used only as a denominative from {{h5692}},; to bake (round cakes on the hearth); bake.

h5747.definition: probably from {{h5746}}; round; Og, a king of Bashan; Og.

h5748.definition: or עֻגָּב; from {{h5689}} in the original sense of breathing; a reed-instrument of music; organ.

h5749.definition: a primitive root; to duplicate or repeat; by implication, to protest, testify (as by reiteration); intensively, to encompass, restore (as a sort of reduplication); admonish, charge, earnestly, lift up, protest, call (take) to record, relieve, rob, solemnly, stand upright, testify, give warning, (bear, call to, give, take to) witness.

h5750.definition: or עֹד; from {{h5749}}; properly, iteration or continuance; used only adverbially (with or without preposition), again, repeatedly, still, more; again, × all life long, at all, besides, but, else, further(-more), henceforth, (any) longer, (any) more(-over), × once, since, (be) still, when, (good, the) while (having being), (as, because, whether, while) yet (within).

h5752.definition: or עֹדֵד; from {{h5749}}; reiteration; Oded, the name of two Israelites; Oded.

h5753.definition: a primitive root; to crook, literally or figuratively; do amiss, bow down, make crooked, commit iniquity, pervert, (do) perverse(-ly), trouble, × turn, do wickedly, do wrong.

h5755.definition: or עַוָּא; (2 Kings 17:24), for {{h5754}}; Ivvah or Avva, a region of Assyria; Ava, Ivah.

h5756.definition: a primitive root; to be strong; causatively, to strengthen, i.e. (figuratively) to save (by flight); gather (self, self to flee), retire.

h5757.definition: patrial from {{h5755}}; an Avvite or native of Avvah (only plural); Avims, Avites.

h5758.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h5753}}; perverseness; iniquity.

h5759.definition: from {{h5764}}; a babe; young child, little one.

h5761.definition: plural of {{h5757}}; Avvim (as inhabited by Avvites), a place in Palestine (with the article prefix); Avim.

h5762.definition: or perhaps (עַיּוֹת (as if plural of {{h5857}}) (עַיוּת; from {{h5753}}; ruin; Avvith (or Avvoth), a place in Palestine; Avith.

h5763.definition: a primitive root; to suckle, i.e. give milk; milch, (ewe great) with young.

h5764.definition: from {{h5763}}; a babe; sucking child, infant.

h5765.definition: a primitive root; to distort (morally); deal unjustly, unrighteous.

h5766.definition: or עָוֶל; and (feminine) עַוְלָה; or עוֹלָה; or עֹלָה; from {{h5765}}; (moral) evil; iniquity, perverseness, unjust(-ly), unrighteousness(-ly); wicked(-ness).

h5767.definition: intensive from {{h5765}}; evil (morally); unjust, unrighteous, wicked.

h5768.definition: or עֹלָל; from {{h5763}}; a suckling; babe, (young) child, infant, little one.

h5769.definition: or עֹלָם; from {{h5956}}; properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always; alway(-s), ancient (time), any more, continuance, eternal, (for, (n-)) ever(-lasting, -more, of old), lasting, long (time), (of) old (time), perpetual, at any time, (beginning of the) world (  without end). Compare {{h5331}}, {{h5703}}.

h5770.definition: denominative from {{h5869}}; to watch (with jealosy); eye.

h5771.definition: or עָווֹן; (2 Kings 7:9; Psalm 51:5 [7]), from {{h5753}}; perversity, i.e. (moral) evil; fault, iniquity, mischeif, punishment (of iniquity), sin.

h5772.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to dwell together; (sexual) cohabitation; duty of marriage.

h5774.definition: a primitive root; to cover (with wings or obscurity); hence (as denominative from {{h5775}}); to fly; also (by implication of dimness) to faint (from the darkness of swooning); brandish, be (wax) faint, flee away, fly (away), × set, shine forth, weary.

h5775.definition: from {{h5774}}; a bird (as covered with feathers, or rather as covering with wings), often collectively; bird, that flieth, flying, fowl.

h5777.definition: or עֹפֶרֶת; feminine participle active of {{h6080}}; lead (from its dusty color); lead.

h5778.definition: from {{h5775}}; birdlike; Ephai, an Israelite; Ephai (from margin).

h5779.definition: a primitive root; to consult; take advice ((counsel) together).

h5780.definition: apparently from {{h5779}}; consultation; Uts, a son of Aram, also a Seirite, and the regions settled by them.; Uz.

h5781.definition: a primitive root; to pack; be pressed.

h5782.definition: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes); to wake (literally or figuratively); (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), × master, raise (up), stir up (self).

h5783.definition: a primitive root; to (be) bare; be made naked.

h5785.definition: from {{h5783}}; skin (as naked); by implication, hide, leather; hide, leather, skin.

h5786.definition: a primitive root (rather denominatively from {{h5785}} through the idea of a film over the eyes); to blind; blind, put out. See also {{h5895}}.

h5787.definition: intensive from {{h5786}}; blind (literally or figuratively); blind (men, people).

h5789.definition: a primitive root; to hasten; assemble self.

h5790.definition: for {{h5789}}; to hasten, i.e. succor; speak in season.

h5791.definition: a primitive root; to wrest; bow self, (make) crooked., falsifying, overthrow, deal perversely, pervert, subvert, turn upside down.

h5793.definition: from {{h5790}}; succoring; Uthai, the name of two Israelites; Uthai.

h5794.definition: from {{h5810}}; strong, vehement, harsh; fierce,   greedy, mighty, power, roughly, strong.

h5795.definition: from {{h5810}}; a she-goat (as strong), but masculine in plural (which also is used elliptically for goat's hair); (she) goat, kid.

h5797.definition: or (fully) עוֹז; from {{h5810}}; strength in various applications (force, security, majesty, praise); boldness, loud, might, power, strength, strong.

h5798.definition: or עֻזָּה; feminine of {{h5797}}; strength; Uzza or Uzzah, the name of five Israelites; Uzza, Uzzah.

h5799.definition: from {{h5795}} and {{h235}}; goat of departure; the scapegoat; scapegoat.

h5800.definition: a primitive root; to loosen, i.e. relinquish, permit, etc.; commit self, fail, forsake, fortify, help, leave (destitute, off), refuse, × surely.
